title: Red Brambleback graphical glitch

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
This happened while playing Evelynn jungle, there's really not much more to it.
https://gyazo.com/c6c7ad57d2676876a3ea35db46d221d9

replies.body: Glorious.  I had no idea LoL had an engine that supported meshes snapping to 0,0,0 coordinates.
Though i'm not sure if it's a fault from my own graphics card or a fault from league itself.
